channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bizarre traffic light signals, 9th September
item.description:
Traffic lights seem to go red as you travel along Cheltenham Rd towards Cheltenham, even though there's no cars or pedestrians on the side streets, before changing to green again, disrupting traffic flow and increasing pollution during quiet periods. Must be faulty sensors somewhere.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 256 Cheltenham Road, Elmbridge
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin Overflowed, 9th September
item.description:
Bin has been overflowing all week

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Leacey Court, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain in underpass, 9th September
item.description:
The drain at the underpass coming from Station Road, Churchdown is blocked and constantly floods. You cannot walk here when there is a lot of rain
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 important street lights not working on Cirencester Road, 9th September
item.description:
Two streetlights not working on Cirencester opposite grounds of St Edwards Senior school. They have been out for two weeks. It is very dark here and the road is used by ambulances every day and no street lighting is making it dangerous for speeding ambulances. Also the lights are close to 3 bungalows where very elderly people live. It would be very easy for burglaries to take place when it is so dark in the evening
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 30cm deep sinkhole, 9th September
item.description:
Yet another sinkhole - the road needs deep investigation as this is happening repeatedly and the road is going to collapse!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5a Dunalley Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain cover missing, 7th September
item.description:
Been missing for over a month now. I saw this being attended to by the council and they placed a traffic cone over the open drain. Remains a problem
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): St. James Cottage Saint James' Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole outside my house, 7th September
item.description:
I recently reported two potholes outside my house that had been left in an oily mess and now on returning from the half marathon on Sunday, with friends, one of them had oil on the bottom of their shoes which has subsequently gone onto a rug and I can't get it out. The lane is becoming a mess and I have to drive round it to avoid getting on my drive, please sort immediately Geraldine Prosser, Harbury Spring Lane Prestbury GL52 3BW
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Shaw Green Lane, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard down and litter building up, 6th September

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 60 Edinburgh Place, Cheltenham
